availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
State of Kentucky
Warren County sct October Term 1862

Ordered that Henry Y Gardner and Thomas S Elrod be and they are hereby recommended to his excellency the Governor of Kentucky One of whom as fit and proper person to fill the office of Justice of the Peace for Warren County in District No 8 to fill the Vacancy caused by the expiration of John D. Manners Term of office in said district

James H. Rose clk W. C. C.
Copy Copy Test

Warren Co.
J.P. in Dists No 1. & 8.
Appd Nov 13. 1862
